item.title: Carlos Alberto add a quote by Carlos Barrios
item.description: "my child, if you want to have a beautiful and happy life... 2 things you need... learn the art of love and practice it with your beloved one." -- Carlos Barrios

item.title: Carlos Alberto add a quote by Sun Tzu
item.description: "Victorious warriors win first and then go to war, while defeated warriors go to war first and then seek to win" -- Sun Tzu

item.title: Carlos Alberto add a quote by Sun Tzu
item.description: "Si utilizas al enemigo para derrotar al enemigo, serás poderoso en cualquier lugar a donde vayas" -- Sun Tzu

item.title: Carlos Alberto add a quote by William Shakespeare
Carlos Alberto add a quote by Benjamin Franklin
item.description: "Fear not death for the sooner we die, the longer we shall be immortal." -- Benjamin Franklin

item.title: Carlos Alberto add a quote by Benjamin Franklin
item.description:
"Beer is proof that God loves us and wants us to be happy.
[misquote of a letter about wine, see quotes/831031]" -- Benjamin Franklin

item.title: Carlos Alberto add a quote by Arthur Conan Doyle
item.description: "It is a great thing to start life with a small number of really good books which are your very own." -- Arthur Conan Doyle

item.title: Carlos Alberto add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Carlos Alberto add a quote by Anaïs Nin
item.description: "We don't see things as they are, we see them as we are." -- Anaïs Nin

item.title: Carlos Alberto add a quote by Mary B. Morrison
item.description: "Pussy is sweeter than honey and more valuable than money." -- Mary B. Morrison

item.title: Carlos Alberto add a quote by David Clennon
item.description: "I'm not comparing Bush to Adolf Hitler - because George Bush, for one thing, is not as smart as Adolf Hitler." -- David Clennon

item.title: Carlos Alberto add a quote by Charlie Chaplin
item.description: "Nothing is permanent in this wicked world, not even our troubles." -- Charlie Chaplin

item.title: Carlos Alberto add a quote by Charlie Chaplin
item.description: "Failure is unimportant. It takes courage to make a fool of yourself" -- Charlie Chaplin

item.title: Carlos Alberto add a quote by Kent M. Keith
item.description:
"The Paradoxical Commandments
People are illogical, unreasonable, and self-centered. Love them anyway.
If you do good, people will accuse you of selfish ulterior motives. Do good anyway.
If you are successful, you will win false friends and true enemies. Succeed anyway.
The good you do today will be forgotten tomorrow. Do good anyway.
Honesty and frankness make you vulnerable. Be honest and frank anyway.
The biggest men and women with the biggest ideas can be shot down by the smallest men and women with the smallest minds. Think big anyway.
People favor underdogs but follow only top dogs. Fight for a few underdogs anyway.
What you spend years building may be destroyed overnight. Build anyway.
People really need help but may attack you if you do help them. Help people anyway.
Give the world the best you have and you'll get kicked in the teeth. Give the world the best you have anyway." -- Kent M. Keith

item.title: Carlos Alberto add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Carlos Alberto add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Carlos Alberto add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "My tastes are simple: I am easily satisfied with the best." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Carlos Alberto add a quote by Winston Churchill
item.description: "You have enemies? Good. That means you've stood up for something, sometime in your life." -- Winston Churchill

item.title: Carlos Alberto add a quote by Karl Marx
item.description: "The last capitalist we hang shall be the one who sold us the rope." -- Karl Marx

item.title: Carlos Alberto add a quote by Carlos Barrios
item.description: "Para los que sufrimos de amores, la mejor cura a nuestro corazon roto siempre a sido la mas simple... Renunciar a quien nunca nos ha correspondido." -- Carlos Barrios

item.title: Carlos Alberto add a quote by Robert T. Kiyosaki
item.description: "You’re only poor if you give up. The most important thing is that you did something. Most people only talk and dream of getting rich. You’ve done something." -- Robert T. Kiyosaki

item.title: Carlos Alberto add a quote by Robert T. Kiyosaki
item.description: "It's not what you say out of your mouth that determines your life,it's what you whisper to yourself that has the most power!" -- Robert T. Kiyosaki

item.title: Carlos Alberto add a quote by Robert T. Kiyosaki
item.description: "If you’re the kind of person who has no guts, you just give up every time life pushes you. If you’re that kind of person, you’ll live all your life playing it safe, doing the right things, saving yourself for something that never happens. Then, you die a boring old man." -- Robert T. Kiyosaki

item.title: Carlos Alberto add a quote by Robert T. Kiyosaki
item.description: "I’d rather welcome change than cling to the past." -- Robert T. Kiyosaki

item.title: Carlos Alberto add a quote by Andrew Wolfe
item.description: "A book without words is like love without a kiss; it's empty." -- Andrew Wolfe

item.title: Carlos Alberto add a quote by Carlos Barrios
item.description: "Flexibility makes buildings to be stronger, imagine what it can do to your soul." -- Carlos Barrios

item.title: Carlos Alberto add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "My dear boy, no woman is a genius. Women are a decorative sex. They never have anything to say, but they say it charmingly. Women represent the triumph of matter over mind, just as men represent the triumph of mind over morals." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Carlos Alberto add a quote by Ernesto Cardenal
item.description: "Esta sera mi venganza: Que un dia llegue a tus manos el libro de un poeta famoso y leas estas lineas que el autor escribio para ti y tu no lo sepas!" -- Ernesto Cardenal
